com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.client.handler
Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.unit.Component
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.client.handler.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IComponent
public class ClientHandler
extends Component

ClientHandler is a composed Component that is responsible for handling all the messages received from the server.

ClientHandler is composed by a single MessageListener and a single MessageProcessor. The sub-components are created at construction time since they define ClientHandler.

ClientHandler needs to be connected with Game before initialization.

Version:
Creation date: 05-28-2008 16:40 EST, Modified date: 08-11-2008 16:55 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
